name: casino-server
description: This is a server to play to the casino

scripts.deploy: npm run clean && mkdir dist && babel --ignore */node_modules ./ --out-dir -s -d ./dist --copy-files
scripts.deployw: npm run cleanw && mkdir dist && babel --ignore */node_modules ./ --out-dir -s -d ./dist --copy-files
scripts.fulldeploy: npm run deploy && cd dist && npm install
scripts.fulldeployw: npm run deployw && cd dist && npm install
scripts.tsbuild: npm run deployw && cd dist && npm run tsc  && del /s *.ts && npm install --production

author: Alex - Logan - Vita
